attributes.review: Every single time i opened the app, I got an add for a company that tried to sell me weird things. I kept the app for a while so i could get the current news, but I started to notice that after every single piece of information, there was an add. And i don’t know how, but i ended up buying a blender every time i used the app. My friends all called me crazy and obsessed and blenders and a hoarder, so i had to start selling the blenders. I then deleted the app to make space on my phone, and all the sudden my blender obsession ended? Anyways if you need a blender, hmu
attributes.title: All Adds
